Speeding Violations Over-speeding Excessive Speed in Restricted Zones Driving Too Fast for Conditions (e.g., poor weather)
Passenger Safety Violations Not wearing seatbelts Overloading Allowing passengers to hang outside the vehicle
Operational Violations Overcharging fares Refusal to convey passengers Operating without a franchise
Traffic Rule Violations Reckless driving Illegal parking Disregarding traffic signs
Driver Conduct Violations Discourteous behavior Driving under the influence Smoking while driving

First two (2) kilometers\nPhp 15.00 – 6 years old and above\nPhp 7.00 - 3-5 years old\nPhp 2.00 - for every succeeding kilometer\n\nChild/ren 0-3 years old FREE OF CHARGE, provided they are sitting on the lap of their guardian.\n\n20% DISCOUNT FOR SENIOR CITIZENS, PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES and STUDENTS\nPhp 12.00 - 6 years old and above\nPhp 1.60 - for every succeeding kilometer
